definition: superb/first-rate/(of officials in imperial times) the highest rank
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
dish containing a variety of meats and vegetables arranged in a broth in a clay pot/chafing dish

sentences.chinese: 这是我母亲最喜欢的一品百合。

sentences.english: The average foot perspires a pint of moisture per day.
sentences.chinese: 平均脚出汗一品脱每天的水分。

sentences.english: At my house I'm the lord and master.
sentences.chinese: 我在家里可是一品大老爷。

sentences.english: Wild poinsettias can grow up to four meters tall.
sentences.chinese: 野生的一品红能够长到4米多高。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony, Zeng paid a visited the exhibition demonstrating the achievements of One Village One Product movement.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式后，曾庆红参观了“一村一品”成果展。

sentences.english: Is definitely worth a first-class village of goods.
sentences.chinese: 绝对是值得一品的上等好茶。

sentences.english: What is your best price on this item?
sentences.chinese: 此一品目的最低价是多少？

sentences.english: Poinsettias are the best-selling potted flowering plant in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 一品红是美国最畅销的盆栽开花植物。

sentences.english: The One Village One Product movement was originally started in Oita Prefecture in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 在一村一品运动最初开始在日本大分县。

sentences.english: We HAs the item in Number 3 price levels .
sentences.chinese: 此一品目，咱们分三种等级的价格。

sentences.english: You can swallow about a pint of blood before you're sick.
sentences.chinese: 在你感觉不舒服之前，最多可以生吞一品脱血。

sentences.english: Bright red poinsettias are the best known.
sentences.chinese: 鲜艳的一品红是最有名的。

sentences.english: He took off a pint of beer in one draught.
sentences.chinese: 他一口气喝光了一品脱啤酒。

sentences.english: All you need is to freeze a pint of ice cream to -3706 F.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要把一品脱冰淇淋冻到零下3706华氏度。

sentences.english: A: What is your best price on this item?
sentences.chinese: 此一品目的最低价是多少？

sentences.english: You telling me you ain't got a pint mug in the 'OLE bleeding boozer?'
sentences.chinese: 你说这个捞什子的鬼地方没有一品脱装的缸子？

definition: refers to academics employed as imperial secretaries from the Tang onwards, forming the Hanlin Imperial Academy 翰林院
(Ming and Qing dynasties) daotai (title for an official responsible for supervising a circuit 道|道[dao4]), aka taotai and circuit intendant
best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
bit (of a bridle)/to hold in the mouth/to harbor (feelings)/to link/to accept/rank/title
to be bestowed, conferred, or granted by the emperor
lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway
